website_summaries.verdict: An exceptional pillow that provides both cooling gel and comfortable contours along with peace of mind thanks to a superior warranty.
pros: Offers a cooling effect that tops the competitors thanks to cooling gel in a unique wave-flow construction
Contoured memory foam is ideal for comfort
cons: It is a heavy pillow, and has a chemical smell that takes a while to fade

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: It finally arrive like 2 weeks ago and i had to let it breath or 4 days because smell weird. I start using it and it was comfortable but i remove the pillow cover and saw that it was coming apart the gel was going out of the plastic and looks like plastic to wrap sandwich is very thin. The idea is good but the finish is not that good as you can see in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the hype!
customer_reviews.text: I *LOVE* this pillow! It took me a while to get used to just because I wasn't sleeping with my head far enough up on the dip, but now that I've gotten into the groove it is the best! I get very hot at night and if I get overheated I have nightmares, so I like to stay as cool as possible. This pillow actually delivers on that, which is something I've found other brands/models don't live up to. Overall I am thrilled with this pillow and would definitely buy it again if anything happened to the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 13 years of hot flashes.
customer_reviews.text: Cool when you first lay down. Warm the rest of the night. But real comfy. If you have hot flashes, like me, 13 years. The best way to use this pillow is to rotate during the night. There’s a low side and a high side. I rotate once during nite for coolness. It is real comfy. Ive had this pillow now a year. When I pulled the pillow case off to clean. The blue gel came spilling out. The gel pouch has opened. Now I can use anymore.
customer_reviews.author: marcia freed

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Delivers Its Promise
customer_reviews.text: I came home from the ER at the hospital today, and I was bone tired from not having slept at all last night and from being in agony. This package was sitting at my door. I opened it ; checked the product; put the pillow on top of another pillow on the couch; and lay down to take a nap. I was out for several hours. My neck doesn’t hurt; my hands aren’t tingling. This pillow provides good support, yet it is also soft in a way, but retains its shape. I am so happy I got this!
customer_reviews.author: KKP

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, but cool
customer_reviews.text: If your room is already pretty cool then this pillow will remain cool as well. It is definitely not a firm pillow though, which you would think from it being memory foam. It's pretty soft and therefore doesn't provide much support (aka the contour in this pillow is absolutely useless for side sleepers). The directions claim to take the pillow out of its case and let it air dry for 24h-48h. The smell wasn't too overwhelming for me so about 10h seemed fine, then you're supposed to wash the case as well. (If the smell stays, you can spray a bit of perfume/cologne to the pillow case to help mask it.)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Cooler heads prevail
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Beegood, Bamboo, and thus same time. Visco is the coolest of the three by far. It is firm, and meant for back sleepers (which I'm not). While I use it for the cooling factor, it nice to use as leg separator when sleeping on side. The chemical smell other reviewers mentioned is accurate, but does goes away after about a month. I personally couldn't use it after unwrapping it the first week. It is a great pillow for those who enjoy a cool pillow (although it last about 10 mins per side) and sleep on their back (the design is meant for it).
customer_reviews.author: Obiwanoah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay cool
customer_reviews.text: Although I appreciate the contour design I didn’t buy the pillow for that, I bought it for the cooling feature Also it was the only one in queen size with the gel completely over the pillow. Sadly the pillow does not remain cool for very long even after putting the sheerest light weight pillow slip on it. I even tried it without a pillow slip but found it irritated my skin. I’ve had the standard pillow with the gel completely on one side that works very well for me however I wanted it in a larger size which is why I ordered this one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Smelled awful, hard, heavy, uncomfortable, awful experience.
customer_reviews.text: Even though this has poor reviews I thought maybe they'd be wrong or case by case kinds of things but unfortunately I was wrong. The pillow I received had been returned, and was packaged in a rats nest of tape. When I opened the pillow, it smelled like something had died inside of it. I aired it out for three days and washed the cover to no avail. There was also a dark green mass on the foam, like something was moldy inside of it. As for the pillow itself, it was so heavy, dense, firm, and too tall to lay on comfortably. I wouldn't wish this pillow on my worst enemy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Young

customer_reviews.title: Ears my thoughts
customer_reviews.text: My doctor told me to find a pillow with a valley in the middle so that the pressure on my ears was reduced. My old pillow, along with an aging constitution, had put such pressure on my ear on my dominant sleeping side that a growth was produced. My doctor removed it and suggested such a pillow. This was my choice. I was put off by the initial smell when I opened the package but I put it on its end for a few days and the smell was reduced enough to try it out. It worked perfectly. I will buy another if this one should ever be lost or lose its "memory." (Hopefully long before mine goes completely.)
customer_reviews.author: gnome d. ploom

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Cooling Pillow For Sweaty People With Spine Problems
customer_reviews.text: Small, dense pillow which works exactly as described, doesn't make your neck sore, and isn't too soft or too firm. No, the cooling gel is not like a blast from the freezer, but it certainly won't make you any more sweaty, and when you happen to wake up hot, you can just turn the pillow around (not flip it over, only gel on one side) and it's super cool. The "memory foam" is the same density and shape as when I bought it a year ago. I usually lose my expensive foam pillows when friends sleep over, etc. but I am absolutely holding onto this and everyone else who admires it can get their own.
customer_reviews.author: Lefanu

customer_reviews.title: May need a priest to get rid of the smell.
customer_reviews.text: Only used it one night so far, and I will say it feels great. It's cooler than your average pillow for sure and the feel is better than any other pillow I've tried. I'd compare it to using a cheesecake from the fridge for a pillow. The smell, however, is vomit-inducing. Seriously, it is noxious and considering it is a pillow... your nose is right there and there is no escaping it. Hoping it will somehow leave this pillow soon. May require an exorcism.
customer_reviews.author: Griffin J

customer_reviews.title: Stench of mold
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is the most comfortable pillow I have ever slept on. The down side is it smells horrific. I did read reviews before purchasing and I thought that it would be a smell that wouldn't be too bad or a pillow that would air out after a couple of days. But no!!! It's strange but the pillow doesn't have any mold on it but it smells like old moldy socks. The stench is so heavy and strong I tried leaving it outside to air out I tried putting three pillow cases on it nothing worked. This pillow had to of been molded at 1 point and just washed however the stench remained.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon Harris

customer_reviews.title: Really, REALLY wanted to love this
customer_reviews.text: I really, really wanted to love this pillow. Out of the box, it had a slight odor (not big deal for me), and it felt like it was going to be "the one". It was soft, but firm and the cooling feature was actually cooling. However, I woke up this morning with massive head, neck, and shoulder pain. This is not at all normal for me. I was so disappointed. The pillow arrived yesterday and was returned today. I cannot recommend this pillow unfortunately, but I can say that this pillow does keep you head cool.
customer_reviews.author: S. Walterreit

customer_reviews.title: Truly cooler, and so comfy.
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic. I sleep hot, and this is much cooler than other memory foam pillows. I've had several with this shape, and love it for side sleeping. It still warms up, though less so than other pillows, so I got two, and I swap them out when I wake up. (I REALLY don't like it warm.) But I used to wake with the down side of my face sweaty. Now, it's just warm. Huge improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Works great for 12-18 months of daily use; New design less good
customer_reviews.text: This pillow worked great for me, with one caveat. The cooling effect was very real for me and it worked great for about 18 months. Recently the gel seems to have worn out and the cooling effect no longer works. In fact I think the gel is now retaining more heat! I got enough good use out of the pillow that I've ordered another to try again. UPDATE: I ordered a second of these as mentioned above, but it's not nearly as good as the first one in the beginning. It's not nearly as cool, and the texture is different. I'm wondering if this is a rebadged product and their OEM changed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: The padding on this pillow makes it very heavy, but in a good way. I like the feel of it. I'm not really sure if it's keeping me cooler than my old pillow. I didn't A/B this pillow with another to test it. But it is comfortable and I feel like that padding has helped this pillow keep its shape in the 6 months or so that I've been using it. You can feel the ridges in the padding with your hand, but I don't notice them when I'm going to sleep. The pillow is really comfortable with that padding.
customer_reviews.author: dink tinkleberry

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says but falling apart quickly
customer_reviews.text: The cooling feature definately is effective and it has helped a lot with chronic neck pain. I definitely feel like it hass helped align everything. The coolong gel is deteriorating really quickly and if I take off the case to wash it there are little sprinkles of the gel everywhere that are hard to clean up. Next time I will get a memory foam pillow without the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Ryiah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I have tried out a few pillows lately to help with sleep apnea. This pillow works well for me as a side sleeper. It is also comfortable when I am relaxing. The memory foam cradles my head, which I think makes it easier on my neck. As for the cooling function: I notice it for the first 5-10 minutes, then the pillow warms up. I am a hot sleeper, and by the morning I would say I am just slightly cooler. There was a not necessarily unpleasant odor that has dissipated over time. To me it just smelled like (naturally) foam.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christian

customer_reviews.title: For the price, this is about as cool as they come.
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest sleeping memory foam pillow I’ve ever owned. It is medium form to firm which is what I prefer. Memory foam breaks down with pressure of use and heat so I’ve replaced a few similar pillows. This one is by far my favorite because the top stays cool the best of all the designs I’ve tried. I’d gladly buy this again when it starts to get soft spots where it is used the most.
customer_reviews.author: Sam J.

customer_reviews.title: Coolest Pillow on the Planet!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact Coolness Duration of this pillow lasts longer than any other! Supports your neck! Wonderful product! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Muge Sevimlier

customer_reviews.title: Love this Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love how it keeps my head cool, supports my neck and head. This pillow has done amazing things to help with my sleep quality. The DR suggested I start sleeping on my back and all the pillows out there where for back or side not both. My sleep quality has improved so much!
customer_reviews.author: Sabina Whittall-Thoreau

customer_reviews.title: Extremely uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: After thinking I finally found a replacement pillow I have discovered how wrong I was. It took a solid 3 weeks for the order to clear from this pillow and after 2 + months I am still not getting a good nights sleep and I frequently wake up multiple times during the night. The past few weeks I have woken up in the morning with a headache. Unfortunately I did not realize that these issues were so profound until now.
customer_reviews.author: JANA HAUSSMANN

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Does keep you cool, very comfortable and helps with my carpal tunnel. I bought this based on another reviewer about carpal tunnel. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Uzzie97

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning it was fine, After using the pillow for few months, the pillow has become soft, lost it's firmness, now it's causing severe pain in my neck and shoulders.
customer_reviews.author: John Evans

customer_reviews.title: "No, you can't borrow my pillow"
customer_reviews.text: Simply a great pillow. When it first arrived, my son tried it out just for the novelty of the gel cover and has been trying to steal it ever since. Pillow theft attempts aside, I've been sleeping better, waking up less stiff, and even seem to fall asleep faster. I planned to order another to secure my investment from pillow-theives. Just got reminded in part because their president/founder, Gabe, just sent a nice "thanks" coupon. Seems like an nice guy and a good company, but I can say for certain their product is fantastic. Second order (and probably not the last) already placed.
customer_reviews.author: SomeRandomGuy2012

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best sleep I have ever had! I was skeptical about the contour shape but it is perfect. First night i used it I finished my night routine and was going to top that with a movie but the moment my head hit the pillow i was out like a light. I felt the difference in my neck right away and can't wait to use my pillow again. *** Second time buying this pillow*** I decided to get this for my father because I still love it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok!
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok pillow... it’s not as firm as I thought it was going to be.. and it’s cooler than my previous pillow... I just wished it was firmer... It does have a “new” smell but I’m pretty sure that will go away with Time... I’ll update after more than one night of sleeping on it .... ****Update**** ok so I've slept on it for a few nights now.. it had almost not firmness to where it conforms to you.. the only thing I really like about it is that it keeps you cool the entire night! thats about it... if you are looking for coolness this is it.. if you are looking for firmness keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: HK Adams

customer_reviews.title: High quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased two of these pillows at different times. The first pillow has maintained quality for over a year. The second one was recently purchased because my spouse wanted the same. There is definitely the strong odor that comes with memory foam. However it goes away with time.
customer_reviews.author: Needelander

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The material is really good and very nice, it's soft and squishy and cradles your head just right. It does offer support for your neck but I wouldn't recommend it as a sleep pillow if only for the fact that you can't sleep on your sides without it being uncomfortable. It's mainly meant for back sleepers. But it does offer support that some might need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $30.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today, but so far, it smells like paint thinner, doesn't stay cool for very long, and goes flat when you lay on it. I'm going to give it a chance before I decide whether to return or not. Update: It has been almost a year since I purchased and the smell did go away after a few months. It is now falling apart though. The blue and white sections have separated and the blue gel is crumbling away. Still doesn’t stay cool for more than a few minutes. I do not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Espy

customer_reviews.title: great supporting pillow
customer_reviews.text: my headaches are gone! I was looking for the perfect pillow for a long time. Finally found and tried this one. I am so happy I did. My sleep has been so much better and my headaches are gone now. Great pillow all around. It does have a faint smell which wears off shortly after unwrapping it. I'd suggest letting it sit outside to air out before sleeping with it if smells bother you.
customer_reviews.author: emily hillman

customer_reviews.title: Adequate support, cooling works long enough for me to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable and helps with neck pain, not as well as my last foam support pillow but adequate. It does take some getting used to and has a very odd smell (still waiting on that to go away). The cooling is awesome, however I have noticed I wake up and it doesn’t seem to be cooling my head anymore. Overall, I would buy another one if I leave this one behind like the last one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line: Amazing pillow (Ironically the bottom line is above the rest of my text though)
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these pillows, and I very much so enjoy them. Con: If you are a warm and light sleeper, the pillow will get hot by the middle of the night I have found that if you flip it (rotate it 180 degrees) so that the other bump is under your head it is cool again Pro: My neck has stopped cracking every few hours! I also feel like I have been getting a much better quality of sleep. Overall, I highly suggest these pillows, and will probably end up getting some for my family to try out too!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow but it doesn’t keep its cool feature
customer_reviews.text: I love the contour feature and it has helped with my migraine headaches but it doesn’t keep the cool feature. It warms up really fast. I wish that it would stay cold for a little bit longer especially when I have a migraine. But overall it’s a great pillow.
customer_reviews.author: 4kids4me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I almost spent $104 on a Sleep Number pillow and I'm soooo glad I waited. This pillow is identical to what I tried out in the store especially with the gel. That is important to me due to "hot nights" at my age. Let me say that this is the 2nd pillow I ordered because the 1st one didn't have the get all the way around, only a portion of the top and that makes a HUGE difference. I have a head of hair so that didn't work for me but this one is perfect! The gel hits your neck and shoulders and it really works!!!
customer_reviews.author: AngR

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: I've had this pillow for a couple of weeks now. I need a cool pillow to sleep as I run super hot at night and it keeps me awake. this pillow does keep me cooler than most pillows. it does smell out of the box and the smell is still there though not as much as it was out of the box. I am hoping it goes away soon. someone who is more sensitive than i would definitely have a problem with it. I am keeping this pillow as it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: glendale, az resident

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this 5 stars but it smells when you first get it. Had to wash the case and air the pillow for two days. Originally bought for my husband and liked it so much I ordered one for myself. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KKelly269

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals! 😕
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable but it smells like chemicals. My pillow case stinks from the pillow too. I tried airing it out for a week and it still smells terrible. I would return it if I could squeeze it back into the tiny box it came in. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: CJN81

customer_reviews.title: Odor takes longer to subside than stated in description
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a good pillow of it's purpose. It really is "cool" gel. Almost too cold for winter use. The main dislike is the smell. Even though the description does state that it will have an odor and will dissipate once opened for a while. This has held it's smell for longer than I prefer. Keep in mind, your face is in close proximity all night and I don't like smelling an odor; although not foul, just not pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: A cooling pillow is a nice idea, but this one doesn't really pull it ...
customer_reviews.text: A cooling pillow is a nice idea, but this one doesn't really pull it off. While it's true that the pillow is cool when you first lay down, the "cooling gel" doesn't stay cool. The heat from your head will eventually heat the gel, so you eventually get a pillow that is actually warmer than a "regular" pillow. The night starts out great, but doesn't end that way. Also, the thicker side, the side that goes under your neck, isn't thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This pillow changed my life!
customer_reviews.text: I am 61 years old and have been suffering from upper back pain for years. I have tried every stretch, exercise, massage, etc, and nothing worked. Since the first night I slept on this pillow, I have had ZERO pain in my upper back. I am a side sleeper and it has the perfect contour, and I LOVE the cool feature that I rest my face on. I bought this several months ago and literally have had no pain as a result of using this pillow. I HIGHLY recommend it, it's worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I went through a period of buying new pillows because I couldn't find one that supported my head and neck and I didn't wake up with a puddle under my head. I finally tried this pillow out and after a few weeks I am sold. I now have to buy my wife one so she stops stealing mine. I will admit that it does have a chemical smell to it For the first two weeks or so but it does fade. The smell is well worth it for how cool it keeps my head.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Schmitz

customer_reviews.title: Firm pillow but hubby likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby. He likes this pillow just fine. It is a bit firm even tho its memory type foam so if you want a SOFT pillow, this is not for you. Also, advise you leave it out in the fresh air for awhile when you first get one of these - has a strong plastic type of smell. Otherwise, great pillow for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for side sleeper
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Very cool for about 20 minutes. Great support for a side sleeper. I have two gel pillows. One with the layer and one with the gel scattered though out the the memory foam. I prefer this pillow, Cons: After the cool 20 minutes the pillow seems to get more hot than the pillow with the cooling gel spread though the memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: N. miller

customer_reviews.title: It's so comfortable! I've always been one to get hot in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's so comfortable! I've always been one to get hot in my sleep, so the cooling gel seemed like a wonderful idea. It doesn't exactly what it's supposed to and cools me right down. Only problem, I just moved to Alaska.. in the winter.. so waking up hot isn't a problem anymore😂 So if don't live somewhere cold, I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Small and too soft
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan. It is just not wide enough. Too soft to maintain support of the necks. And the smell lasted a month before it become acceptable. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mickeysoft

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: We have order several of these pillows and leave them at places we frequently visit. Yes people laugh when the order get there before us! Good support, soft and cool. Nice contour for the neck no matter how you sleep!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Penn

customer_reviews.title: ... Memory Foam Pillow for a few weeks now and recommend it highly
customer_reviews.text: I have had my ViscoSoft Hypoallergenic Memory Foam Pillow for a few weeks now and recommend it highly. The only down point is that the cooling does get warm after laying on for a while. The contour is perfect for me and the pillow is soft enough to be comfortable and firm enough to cradle my hear at the right position to hold my neck straight. With the pillow I had been using, I woke every morning with a headache. But no more. This pillow is gives you the support and comfort I need to wake of a morning with no headache any longer.. i would recommend this pillow to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: joyce hoynacki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pillow!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks (literally) really bad. I tried letting it air out for days like it suggests but it still smells a month later. With that said it is a great pillow for me (my husband also got this same pillow a while before me so I know the smell will eventually go away). I am a dental hygienist and suffer with neck and shoulder pain. I really feel this pillow has helped me feel better. If it weren't for the smell I'd give it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: S. Voican

customer_reviews.title: Sickening smell
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has a horrible smell. Even a month after opening, the smell is incredibly strong and sickening. I wish I had kept packaging to return. It’s certainly not hypo-allergenic. It’s honestly nauseating. So disappointed in the money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: D McCal

customer_reviews.title: The smell gave me a 3 day headache and makes me want to hurl!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has such a strong chemical smell despite airing it out for a week. I have suffered enough and threw it away. I believe it is toxic. I actually had to leave work because of the headache it has given me.
customer_reviews.author: McB

customer_reviews.title: Great cool, great support!
customer_reviews.text: Great pillow! Have had it for about a year But the blue gel peels off and makes a big mess when you need to remove the case for washing. It's like the gel just starts to disintegrate overtime.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Can't quite give it a 5 star. The cooling gel doesn't seem to work as long/well as some of my other old pillows (that this replaced), and it feels a bit thin in narrow middle (can about count my fingers with the back of my skull). It does do a good job being ergo dynamic, and is still pretty comfortable. Price was decent for style of pillow too. A little thicker, or maybe not as conforming of foam would probably of put this easily into 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Rion Boyd

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!!!! So worth it.  From someone who has daily chronic pain it helps so much!!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING PRODUCT!!!!! I have very bad neck issues. Literally have new skin all over my neck because of my neck issue. Along with that I have Complex regional pain syndrome which makes my arm leg and neck burn all day. This pillow actually lets me sleep! BEST PILLOW EVER!!! Wish I had money for a second. Whoever the maker of this pillow is THANK YOU!!! I can finally sleep again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This feels cool for a short time and then feels like any other pillow. We’ve had it for a few months now and it’s falling apart. Pieces of the gel foam are breaking off. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oh so blue
customer_reviews.text: They talk a good game but the pillow doesn't cool at all it instead turned me blue . From the dye in the "cooling gel" it took a week to come off my skin after the rash healed .
customer_reviews.author: belle the imp

customer_reviews.title: cooling pillow, not so cool
customer_reviews.text: being of the older female age.... This pillow did not stay cool enough. One of the negative reviews was the smell so I left it on the porch for 4 solid days to hopefully get rid of the smell, but it didn't. It was better than when I first opened it, but the smell was still there.
customer_reviews.author: dana hall

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, I haven't slept on it because after two months, it still smells terrible! I can't even have it in the bedroom, it stinks. I wish I knew the smell wouldn't go away before the 30 day return policy had lapsed. :(
customer_reviews.author: trinitystar998

customer_reviews.title: This thing is heavy!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had a memory foam pillow and was disappointed that my head sank right into it. It does seem to keep cool. Overall it seems to be a decent pillow. Update: I’ve had this pillow for a couple of months now and I suppose it’s a good pillow but I don’t care for it. My head sinks into it and there’s no support. My shoulder hurts in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Timbarina

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chocolate
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is comfortable but it could stand to be a little firmer. The first night out of the box it was off-gassing, which is to be expected with memory foam products. But two days out of the box the smell changed from foam to chocolate. I kid you not, this pillow smells like chocolate, my hair smells like chocolate. It’s subtle so my whole room doesn’t smell like it but OMG, I go to bed and wake up every day wanting chocolate now.
customer_reviews.author: Tatum

customer_reviews.title: Decently cool, for a while
customer_reviews.text: It mostly works as expected, although it doesn't stay cool as long as I was hoping. It's better than any of the memory foam alternatives I've tried, but I still wake up with a hot pillow under my neck and head after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Stays cool & has GREAT support!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new pillow! The only complaint I have, is that it's WAY too small even for a standard pillow case. I haven't been able to figure off what kind of pillow cases to get.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was a pleasant surprise. It’s cool when I initially lay down, just long enough to get me to sleep. I’ve never used a pillow like this before so for me I’m really enjoying it. It has definitely improved my sleep and reduced neck pain. I’m not near as critical as some people so take this review for what it is, my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell.
customer_reviews.text: It has a chemical smell that hasn't left after airing out for over 2 weeks. It's going back.
customer_reviews.author: esmarelda

customer_reviews.title: It's helped me a lot with my migraines
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from frequent migraines, which i get on the back of my head. A lot of times, i get em in the middle of the night, or in the mornings, and i decided to change my pillow because i was using a regular standard pillow, i needed one with neck support...i figured that might ease the migraines. Well, i was right!! I've been using this pillow for 2weeks now and i feel so much better!! I wake up with no pain, and the coolness of the pillow really helps a lot, i love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mechelle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my short neck. Very heavy for a pillow and it smelled like mildew and felt like trying to sleep in clay. Sorry..
customer_reviews.author: Reba Jean Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cooling pillow, especially during the summer months. My bf is the one who uses it, I cannot use it because it elevates my head too much and causes a headache. But my bf loves it! Glad we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Leeza S

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. It's not too firm and the cooling gel on my head it awesome. I highly recommend this pillow above the others. I have tried other ones that say cooling max and they don't even come close to the cooling of this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Angers

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for the best pillow for my husband who suffers from neck pain and back pain and I must say this pillow is amazing so comfortable also helps to relieve the awful pain he had been experiencing. In the future I plan on buying myself one too!!!!
customer_reviews.author: david & tiff 0503

customer_reviews.title: Gel decays after awhile... but good pillow until then.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable pillow. However, the gel got all gooey and sticky after awhile and I had to replace the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Decent Pillow for Price
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is definitely good for the price. It is a bit small in size IMO and has an odd odor for a while after opening it. The gel is nice and does help keep thing cool. Overall it is a good pillow
customer_reviews.author: Yount

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is GREAT!!! It’s cooling comfortable and supportive! I just wish it would come with a 2nd cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie Russell

customer_reviews.title: For the price, the product should last longer.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved these pillows at first, but after a year, the blue gel is peeling off quite a bit. The covers are polyester and cheap, so we just use two cotton pillow cases so that it’s breathable, otherwise it’s not very cool. For the price, the product should last longer.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Nice materials but doesn't provide the support of $100+ pillows that look similar
customer_reviews.text: It feels good quality, but the weight of your head makes it sink in time, and therefore, there's very little actual support. I bought this one hoping it was virtually the same as the formed memory foam pillow I bought at Sleep Number (which costs $120) but learned that the two are very different in how much support they give your head and the price difference reflects that. This pillow might work for some people but didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: webfoot duck

customer_reviews.title: I really do love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this pillow! I needed/wanted a pillow which would cradle my neck and keep me from tossing and turning - and this does that. It feels so 'cool' that as it's winter right now - I have to put a flannel pillow case on it. But I know that come summer this is going to feel so wonderfully cool - I can't wait!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but smells
customer_reviews.text: My neck stopped hurting. I sleep on my side and back. The only thing is the new smell has a strong not so pleasant odor even after a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pillow
customer_reviews.text: This one of the best pillow ever in my life. I have had lots of problems with pillow. If the pillow doesn’t support my neck the way I want, it goes very badly. But this pillow is a great one. I slept through the night like a baby. It supported my neck so comfortably that I didn’t feel like waking up. I would recommend this pillow to anyone and everyone who is looking for a comfortable pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Nitemare

customer_reviews.title: Made my neck pain much worse
customer_reviews.text: I liked the gel outside to keep it cool but otherwise would NOT recommend this pillow. It made my chronic neck pain much worse
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: In love with this pillow
customer_reviews.text: In love with this pillow!!! The best pillow I've ever owned. I have had other memory foam like pillows and none of them compare to this one it is the best! I wasn't sure if the cooling would work and it does it keeps the pillow cold no matter how long I lay on it! Also the cover is perfect I can just throw it in the wash whenever and it is a super soft cover this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow, CHEAP quality
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has great support and the cooling feature was really nice for someone who is often warm. However, less than 4 months after it's purchase the pillow started falling apart. The cooling gel started to separate from the pillow, stick to the pillowcase and created a mess. While the pillow is nice, it's not worth the cost for the poor quality of production.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Beach

customer_reviews.title: Gel covering the entire top surface is nice
customer_reviews.text: Having the gel cover the top surface is nice. Most pillows have the gel in the center bordered by memory foam. With those pillows the back of my head would be cool while my neck would get warm. This pillow cools my head as well as my neck which is nice. The gel looks like a film layered on top of the memory foam. I hope it doesn't peel off or pick apart like other pillows I've had in the past. Time will tell. Loving it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first night I had this pillow I slept like a baby and ordered one for my husband
customer_reviews.text: I got one for me first because I'm trying to get in the habbit of sleeping on my back. I'm a tummy sleeping and it's really messing up my neck. The first night I had this pillow I slept like a baby and ordered one for my husband. This was the best priced ergonomic, hypoallergenic pillow I could find. My husband and I both love these pillows!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: I have had the pillow now for almost 2 weeks. The strong chemical odor is not going anywhere. I have aired it out and it is still as strong as the day I received it. Extremely nauseating and triggering migraines. I will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I think the pillow offers a good shape but their is Horrible smell that won’t go away even after airing out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Keith

customer_reviews.title: Oder that never leaves.
customer_reviews.text: This pillow had an awful Oder that never left. They warn you about saying to air out for a few days. It never left. So I never used it. The smell transferred to other items in my home. It ended up in the garbage. I gave it one star because this site won’t let me submit with out clicking on at least one. I wanted to leave zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: falconfan

customer_reviews.title: Very cool
customer_reviews.text: This does definitely provide cooling while you sleep. I wish that it was a little more contoured though. Overall the cooling is the best part of this pillow. Much cooler than other ones I have used.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, not very supportive
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft and doesn’t really support the neck. The version I like was n back order for 6 weeks, so I ordered this. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo-dog

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband. He is happy with it. When he gets up in morning i steal it.
customer_reviews.author: Donnaray

customer_reviews.title: Good night sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I used to have neck pain every morning because of my old pillow. I have changed several pillows but the neck discomfort and pain was always there. After switching to this pillow, I do have good night sleep and don’t have the neck discomfort/pain anymore. I have used this pillow for 2 months now. I hope the pillow holds its shape and properties long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When I first receive this pillow it is perfect. But I have had to replace it every ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first receive this pillow it is perfect. But I have had to replace it every 5 months this cannot be right. My Chiropractor has suggested that I write to you for reimbursement. I cannot use this pillow without hurting my neck and shoulders. I am in neck pain and have to see an MD each time this pillow starts to not hold up. Why is so perfect at the onset and then goes bad in 4-5 months? Please advise, Laurie
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell will give you a headache!! It’s terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed with this product, the reason: IT STINKS SO BAD!! I bought for my husband for Christmas and we immediately noticed the smell , Hoping it would air out and fade, it has not. The smell is so bad, chemically , with mildew. He no longer uses, was a waste of money, wish we would have returned before the date expired! Don’t buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: It's good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The pillow came already starting to fall apart. Was offered a replacement but it would just be the same. The pillow was decent though and lasted almost a year before now falling apart and leaking adhesive through the case. It's good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: Good size pillow, cooling factor works well. Would not purchase again because it smells horrible. I couldn't sleep with it, luckily my husband loves me enough to sleep with it. I still smell it next to me though.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Odor
customer_reviews.text: Though the pillow seems like it would be comfortable, the odor won't seem to leave. It is so strong that it makes my throat burn. I tried airing it out and I've had it for a month now and still I cannot use it. Sadly a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and helps me sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the pillow. it is soft and supports neck and back. The only major problem is that the gel r pillow itself smells like chemicals and plastic. This was the 2nd pillow I ordered because the 1st one smelled horribly!! Even with 2 pillow cases covering it, I randomly rollover in middle if night to the slight smell of plasticy/chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome pillow!!
customer_reviews.text: It is great, as I was expecting it’s cool so your ears don’t heat It’s awesome pillow it works for me!!!
customer_reviews.author: yasmin castrillon

customer_reviews.title: Finally sleeping well.
customer_reviews.text: I have been through numerous pillows over the last 3 years trying to find something I was happy with. zThis one finally did the trick. It is cooling and very comfortable. It cradles my head without putting any pressure on my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: The smell is awful
customer_reviews.text: I would give this pillow 5 stars for comfort and cooling... but I can't get past the awful chemical smell.. I've had it for over a week and it's still awful. I even put it outside for 24 hours and it still stinks. If your sensitive to smells do not buy this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping better
customer_reviews.text: I really like the support and cool feeling of this pillow. The support is better than my other much more expensive traditional pillow. I’d recommend it for others that might have neck issues. This forces better posture/support of the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Hot hot hot
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t offer much support after a few minutes of using head sinks in the cooling portion only stays cool for about 20 minutes before it becomes hot and unbearable to sleep on
customer_reviews.author: MAtt

product_meta.title: ViscoSoft Hypoallergenic Standard Memory Foam Arctic Gel Pillow with Cooling Gel and Removable Cover
product_meta.description:
Size:StandardREVAMP YOUR SLEEPING ENVIRONMENT WITH THE ARCTIC GEL PILLOW 

You have likely heard of memory foam technology and its tremendous relief and soothing sleep benefits. Our cooling gel pillow reacts to the sleeper's body, optimizing airflow.

FRESH, COOLING GEL COMFORT 

Cooling gel cradles the head and neck, optimizing airflow and helping your body maintain a cooler temperature throughout the night.

MOLDED MEMORY FOAM 

Our innovative pillow conforms seamlessly to the contours of the head, neck and shoulders. The pressure-sensitive memory foam offers a loft of support that accommodates side and back sleepers. 

REMOVABLE, WASHABLE COVER MADE WITH COOLMAX FABRIC 

Hypoallergenic, comfortable, and washable, our pillow’s cover is water-resistant, allowing you to wake up free of discomfort and excessive moisture. 

Pillow Size: 24" x 16" x 4" 

Start Sleeping Right, Today!
feature_bullets: COOLING GEL: The Arctic Gel Pillow contains our wave-flow cooling gel that is specifically formulated to react to the sleeper's body, optimizing airflow.
THREE PERFECTLY CRAFTED LAYERS - The supportive foam core, the heat-dissipating cooling gel, and the soft, removable cover come together to create the pillow of your dreams.

HYPOALLERGENIC, MOISTURE WICKING BREATHABLE COVER: Our smooth, washable and sanitary pillow cover, made with COOLMAX fabric, is hypoallergenic and anti-bacterial. Moisture-wicking properties ensure a cleaner, fresher sleep experience.

YOUR CUSTOM PILLOW: Invest in memory foam and change the way you sleep. The molded memory foam around your head and neck’s curvature provides optimal support that’s tailored to your individual needs, helping you wake up refreshed, energized and ready to make the most out of your waking hours – all thanks to this simple yet incredibly effective change in your sleeping habits.

VISCOSOFT’S SUPERIOR GUARANTEE: We are a leading, USA-based brand committed to providing you with premium products for improving your quality of life. In the unlikely event you change your mind, you’re welcome to return your pillow for a FULL refund within the first 30 days post-purchase. All ViscoSoft pillows are backed by our outstanding 3-year warranty for manufacturing defects.
